price: Ɛnyε hwee ho nti na Mebͻͻ Jinn ne nnipa, na mmom (Mebͻͻ wͻn) sε wͻ’nsom Me.
arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡتُ ٱلۡجِنَّ وَٱلۡإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعۡبُدُونِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamā khalaqtu al-jina wal-insa illā liyaʿbudūni
